<p><strong>Location:</strong> 3885, -0214, 0164 - Under a rocky overhang, above Lanayru Bay.</p>

<ol>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278146" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1773" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278146" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Chichim Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Desert</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rauru's Blessing</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Coordinates: -3211, -3008, -0049</li>
<li>Inside <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281621">Ancient Prison Ruins</a>.</li>
<li>After falling into the sinkhole, head straight and Ultrahand the first gate lever. Through the gate, follow the prison hallway until you reach a Gerudo statue holding up a weapon; it's pointing towards the correct path. Go under the partially opened gate towards another Ultrahand lever. Turn right and fall into the under-cell floor. Crouch through a gap in the stone wall and look for a sand and rumble ramp up to a cell. In the cell, walk forward onto the loose floor tiles and descend into a new under-cell area. Follow the Gerudo Statue's direction forward to the lit gate. Standing in front of the gate, Ascend up through the cell floor. In the new cell, use Ultrahand to move the two stone slabs to reveal a lever. Use Ultrahand to pull the lever and open the door leading to the Shrine.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Walk to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282873">Mighty Zonaite Spear</a>: Just before the end statue.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                                                    <td>Akkala Highlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Prone Pathway</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 3305, 1443, 0426 - Overlooks the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281648">South Akkala Plains Chasm</a>  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ascend through the column to the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Strike the crystal to rotate the structure and align the door.</li>
<li>Once in the room, pivot it so the large column is in the far right corner, with the gap at the bottom.</li>
<li>Ascend through the column to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>10x Arrows - After entering the large room, Ascend through the column to the right.</li>
<li>Zonai Charge - After entering the large room, rotate it twice. The chest is on the now accessible ledge.</li>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281649">Strong Zonaite Shield</a> - After grabbing the above Zonai Charge, head to the chest by the initial entrance. Shoot the crystal to rotate the room and fall on the pillar.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="283429" data-category-id="9019" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1778" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Dyeing to Find It</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine Quest</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Lanayru Wetlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>Associated Shrine:</strong> <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277763">Kurakat Shrine</a>  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Talk to the Steward Construct to start the quest.</li>
<li>Look on the other side of the gap to see a white pattern on the rock face. The pattern resembles the shape of the stone column on your side of the gap.</li>
<li>The objective is to alter the shape of the column's shadow so that when it falls on the white pattern it has roughly the same shape.</li>
<li>You can change the shape of the column's shadow by using some combination of turning it using the wheel nearby and/or attaching one or two boards to it.</li>
<li>Wait until morning. At approximately 6:00 AM the column's shadow will fall on the white pattern. If it has roughly the same shape, the shrine will appear.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8977 region-1776">

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277998" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1769" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277998" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Ekochiu Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Great Hyrule Forest</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rise and Fall</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 1062, 1279, 0045 - Out in the open, south of the Great Hyrule Forest. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Step on the pressure plate until the platform moves to the other side, then step off.</li>
<li>Jump on the platform, then Recall it to reach the other side.</li>
<li>Jump on the grated cube, then Recall it up the waterfall.</li>
<li>Place the grated cube on the launch pad, then step on the pressure plate to launch it in the air.</li>
<li>After it falls down, jump on the cube and Recall it. When it is back to its highest point, paraglide to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279492">Zonaite Shield</a> - In the 2nd room, on top of a pillar. Before Recalling the grated cube, move it to the right and open the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Eldin's Colossal Fossil</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Side Quest</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Deep Akkala</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How To Begin:</strong> Speak to Loone on the path near East Akkala Stable  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Find the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278384">Eldin Great Skeleton</a></li>
<li>Replace the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278385">Eldin Great Skeleton's Eye</a></li>
<li>Speak with Loone to complete the quest; she relocated <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278386">here</a></li>
</ul>

                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rauru's Blessing</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3595, 0957, 1699 - On Lightcast Island, in the center. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> <em>Note: The following solution is to make the shrine appear</em></p>
<ol>
<li>Activate the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283450">Terminal</a> to drain the water in the center of the island.</li>
<li>Enter the central pillar and destroy the cracked wall.</li>
<li>Once inside, grab the mirror with Ultrahand. Hold it horizontally within the light beam, then sweep the room to find another mirror. Drop the mirror, then go to the new one.</li>
<li>Repeat step 3 until you find a glowing hexagon; illuminate it to lower the island's center.</li>
<li>Take the steps down to the shrine.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Star Fragment - Just before the end statue.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Gasas Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Ridge</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Well-Timed Cuts</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3079, 1617, 0243 - At the western end of Tabatha Canyon. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Shoot the rope to drop the metal cube and make a platform to the other side.</li>
<li>Grab the first metal cube, and Attach it to the second to create a staircase to the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Attach both plates end-to-end to make a bridge to the other side.</li>
<li>Attach the metal cube to one end of the bridge to create a counterweight. Then, place the bridge in the western alcove.</li>
<li>Shoot the hanging chest on the bridge. Use the Small Key inside to open the door.</li>
<li>Using Ultrahand, swing the large ball side-to-side, and shoot the rope when the momentum is right. The ball should drop in the socket and open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonai Charge - Before the Small Key door, hanging above the chasm. Place the bridge under it before shooting the rope.</li>
</ul></td>

<p><strong>Location:</strong> 4497, 0830, 0095 - Below, on the ledge  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Wait for the ball to fall on the bouncing platform. When it reaches the mid-point, use Rewind on the platform, which should bounce the ball on the target. Adjust timing accordingly.</li>
<li>Repeat the process, this time standing on the smaller side platform. This should launch Link upwards; glide to the end statue.</li>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277950" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1793" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277950" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Gemimik Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Deep Akkala</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Turbine Power</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 4513, 2116, 0001 - In the center of the spiral peninsula.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Attach the turbine to the central device.</li>
<li>Complete the electrical circuit with the metal plate. Doing so should power up the turbine and create a wind current.</li>
<li>Paraglide all the way up the wind current, then head to the top-left corner. Throw down a Flame Emitter.</li>
<li>Break the circuit to stop the turbine. Then, Attach the Flame Emitter to it, and recomplete the circuit. Doing so should light all candles and open the gate to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281642">Mighty Zonaite Shield [Chest]</a> - On a high ledge, in the top-right corner of the room. Glide to it from the top of the wind current.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280001" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Genli's Home Cooking</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Side Quest</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Tabantha Frontier</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How to Begin:</strong> Speak to Genli after starting <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570">Tulin of Rito Village</a>. She can often be found inside <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276845">The Slippery Falcon</a> General Store.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> Give Genli a Staminoka Bass to enhance her cooking.  </p>
<p><strong>Reward:</strong> Biting Simmered Fruit</p></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8977 region-1785">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278363" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Igoshon Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Orbs of Water</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 3480, 0667, 1325 - High on an island, up a waterfall. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Stand on top of the plate, and swim in the floating orb to reach the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Stand inside the water orb in the far right corner, and Recall it to the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Enter the moving orb and swim to the next platform.</li>
<li>Attach the slab to the moving platform to form a launch ramp, and move it in the path of the orb. Ride the orb to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonai Charge - Falling repeatedly, left of the higher ledge. Ultrahand an orb in its path to catch the chest and bring it to the ledge.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1794">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277432" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1794" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277432" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Ihen-a Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Lanayru Great Spring</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Midair Perch</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 3805 - 0573 - 0484 - At the top of the mountain, by <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277431">Miphia Court</a> </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the platforms to create stairs to the ledge above.</li>
<li>Attach the grate to the platform. Then, activate it and place it above the gap; it should remain there and allow you to cross.</li>
<li>Bring the grate above the next gate, angling it upwards to access the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Attach the ball to a platform, and place it beside the metal slab.</li>
<li>Jump on the platform and shoot the crystal; this should launch the platform across the gap.</li>
<li>Place the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>5x Arrow - In the final room, in an alcove against the left wall. Place a floating platform beside it, then Ascend through.</li>
</ul></td>

<ol>
<li>Defeat the construct, then use his Flame-Emitter Shield to melt the ice block in the doorway.</li>
<li>Defeat the construct on the left, then use his Stone-Slab shield to move beyond the flames into the next room.</li>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Great Sky Island</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>The Ability to Combine</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 0027, -1503, 1408 - ??  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Fuse the Boulder to any weapon (such as the nearby Broadsword) to create a Hammer. Use this hammer to smash the cracked pillars on the far side of the room.</li>
<li>In the next room, turn right and collect the Fire Fruits from the bushes.</li>
<li>Fire a Flaming Arrow at the vine-covered platform against the far wall. You can make an arrow flaming by Fusing a Fire Fruit to it.</li>
<li>Grab the Small Key from the fallen chest, and unlock the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>5x Arrow - On a pillar, in the second room. Break it using a makeshift hammer to drop the chest.</li>

                                                                                                    <td>Side Adventure</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Great Hyrule Forest</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>Previous Side Adventure:</strong> None  </p>
<p><strong>How To Begin:</strong> Speak with Kazul after completing obtaining at least one Vow from <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277708">Regional Phenomena</a>.</p>
<p><strong>Reward:</strong> After completing the following side adventures:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=290433">Dusk Claymore [Chest]</a></li>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277021" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Ishodag Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Windy Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> On top of the rocky mound.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Rotate the first fan so it is blowing air up, close to the next floor, and use your glider to get to the next floor. </li>
<li>Attach the second fan to the back of the board and activate it to float across the water. </li>
<li>Take the fan off the wooden platform and attach it to the small platform that can be dragged up and down leading to the next floor, facing up and activate it. Leave it for now.</li>
<li>Attach one of the fans to the bottom of the rotating concrete platform to get the chest upright. Use the second fan to blow your glider up to the platform. </li>
<li>Open the chest and use the ultrahand to push the previous platform up as high as you can take it. Let it drop back down. </li>
<li>Get on top of the platform and use Recall so it goes back up. Use your glider with the fan you placed there earlier and that will get you to the shrine's end. </li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Opal - Stuck to a pivoting platform, past the pool. Attach a fan to the platform, just under the chest, and activate it to rotate the platform. Then, Ascend through to open the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Tabantha Frontier</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>The Right Roll</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3538, 0853, -0133 - <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278229">Tanagar Canyon West Cave</a> - At the far end of the cave, behind 3 thick cracked walls. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the ball on the slope so it rolls on the target.</li>
<li>Attach the two balls together, then place them on the angled slope. They should roll on both sides of the angle to the target.</li>
<li>Attach the three balls together, like a snowman. Ultrahand the snowman to the end of the curved slope, and drop it at the edge. It should fall and hit the target to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>10x Arrows - In the final room, on a high pillar. Slant the snowman against the pillar and jump from ball to ball to reach it.</li>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Mount Lanayru</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Jailbreak</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 4268, -1671 ,0182 - On the side of the Lanayru Range </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Swap the positions of the two right blocks (the top block to the left, the bottom one to the right.</li>
<li>Ascend through the right block to the central ledge, then paraglide to the block on the left.</li>
<li>Move the block above to the right, then Ascend twice to reach the top.</li>
<li>Place the slab horizontally, slightly offset to the right under the taller pillar. Ascend through it.</li>
<li>Grab the slab through the bars, and place it horizontally on a corner of the jail. Ascend through it and to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283075">Magic Staff</a> - In the 2nd room, on a platform right of the entrance. Ascend to the chest.</li>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Shape Rotation</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3983, -1084, 0624 - ??  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the long piece of stone, and rotate it so it fits through the X-shaped hole in the wall.</li>
<li>Use the long piece of stone to create a bridge to the other side.</li>
<li>Repeat the process for the dual-cube-shaped piece of rock, rotating it so it fits through both walls.</li>
<li>Place the shape to create a staircase to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Hasty Elixir - On a ledge, in the 2nd puzzle room. After crossing the first gate, place the two blocks in the hole to create a staircase to the chest.</li>

                                </td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Jirutagumac Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Flying Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 2911, 0525, 0929 - Inside the spinning sphere. From a higher island, time your jump and glide down through the sphere's opening. Hit the Zone device inside to stop the sphere's spinning. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Place a Wing on the launch rail, and ride it to the left-most platform (step on the left wing to control it).</li>
<li>Attach a Sled underneath the Wing, then ride it to the right-most platform.</li>
<li>Attach a Fan behind the Wing, then jump on it and activate it, facing the end statue. This should fly across the room to it.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonaite - On a platform, high above the right-most platform. Before attaching the Fan, place the Wing between the two platforms, as a bridge. Step on it and Ascend to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1776">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277810" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1776" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277810" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Jiukoum Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>West Necluda</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Built for Rails</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> On top of the mountain. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Attach both plates together, then place them horizontally on the wide rails. Ride them to the next platform.</li>
<li>Attach the three square plates into a "U" shape. Place it upside down on the rails and ride it to the next platform.</li>
<li>Attach the plates here into an "E" shape. Then, place it on the rails so the top and bottom plates are within the rails. Finally, Attach a Fan above each plate, and activate them to ride your contraption to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Sticky Elixir - Before the second set of rails, on a high ledge. Attach the platforms into a ramp to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rauru's Blessing</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 3809, 1219, 0090 - At the bottom of the water fall  </p>
<p><strong>Shrine Quest:</strong> <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281455">Rock For Sale</a></p>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281457">Diamond</a></li>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Jochi-iu Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Deep Akkala</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Courage to Pluck</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 4346, 2875, 0165 - In plain sight, north of the road.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Using Ultrahand, remove 2 metal blocks from the gigantic Jenga puzzle. Make sure the blocks you take do not unbalance the structure.</li>
<li>Use the metal blocks to close the circuit, powering the platform.</li>
<li>Ride the platform to reach the Ball, and grab it with Ultrahand.</li>
<li>Place the ball in the socket to open the gate to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281643">Zonaite Bow</a> - On a high ledge. Use one of the metal blocks to create a ramp to it.</li>
<li>Large Zonaite - Within the Jenga structure. Stand on the corner of the platform, and grab it with Ultrahand.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Faron Grasslands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Building Bridges</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Coordinates: 1516, -3576, 0142</li>
<li>On a cliff overlooking the stable</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Reattach the broken bridge to reach the next ledge.</li>
<li>Drop down, and Attach the third panel from the end to the pillar. The bridge should be taut enough to reach the next platform.</li>
<li>Attach the metal cube to the last panel of the bridge, then Ultrahand it over the beam. Climb back up and walk the bridge to the next platform.</li>
<li>Walk the bridge to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonaite: On a high platform beside the last bridge. Ultrahand the middle panel and Attach it to the plate on the side.</li>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277022" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1778" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Jonsau Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Lanayru Wetlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Deep Force</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 1751, 0011, 0034 - On a grassy plain, near the shore.</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the floating ball underneath the target, then push it down the water and release it. It should launch upwards and hit the target.</li>
<li>In the next room, defeat the construct.</li>
<li>Repeat step 1 with the floating board, placing it vertically so it launches straight.</li>
<li>In the next room, launch the floating ball under the moving platform to dislodge it and let it fall into the water. Then, jump in the platform and Recall it to the top.</li>
<li>Paraglide to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283430">Strong Construct Bow</a> - In the 2nd room, in the water by the first pillar. Grab it with Ultrahand.</li>

                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Water Makes a Wat</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 1882, 1202, 1251 - On the main island of South Eldin Sky Archipelago (reachable via the train rails) </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Activate the hydrant to create a block of cooled lava, then Ultrahand it away. Do it until you have 4 blocks and Attach them together into a bridge to cross the gap.</li>
<li>Destroy the cracked blocks using any hammer-type weapon. If you don't have any, Fuse a lava block with the nearby Rusty Claymore.</li>
<li>Bring your bridge in the next room, and use it to reach the end statue. You can always extend it by adding more lava blocks.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279495">Strong Construct Bow</a> - On a high ledge, past the first gap. Use your bridge to reach it as a ramp.</li>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Karahatag Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Desert</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Drifting Flame</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3730, -3624, 0043 - In the middle of the oasis. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Light up the upside-down candle left of the door. You may light the Torch on the floor and throw it.</li>
<li>Ultrahand the candle, and move it above each white tile, stopping a little every time. Then, bring it to the pressure plate.</li>
<li>Press on the pressure plate; this should lower the floor and reveal the upside down candles.</li>
<li>Recall your candle; it should fly back and light the 3 upside down candles.</li>
<li>Walk to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282827">Mighty Construct Bow</a> - In the 2nd room, underneath the pressure plate. Jump down and paraglide back to access.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                                                    <td>Great Hyrule Forest</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Shining in Darkness</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -0395, 2735, 0287 - On the mountain ridge </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Form the starting room, turn left, then right. Cross the crushing walls, then head at the end of the hallway.</li>
<li>Ultrahand the slab away to reveal the chest containing the Small Key,</li>
<li>Make your back to the starting the room and unlock the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Opal - In a small alcove. From the starting room, turn left twice; the alcove is just beyond the lasers.</li>
<li>Amber - Behind a stone cube on the wall. From the starting room, turn right, the look on the right wall.</li>
<li>Luminous Stone - Beyond some crushing walls. From the Small Key chest, turn left twice.</li>
<li>Zonaite Bow - Above the ceiling. From the Small Key chest, past the crushing walls, look up for bright hole.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Kitawak Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Highlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Upward and Forward</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -1529, -2928, 0321 -  Atop the East Gerudo Mesa</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Attach the stone slab at the end of the other to drop them and cross the gap.</li>
<li>Dislodge the slab, and attach it at the end of the other one ahead; they should fall towards Link.</li>
<li>Attach the other slab at the end to complete the ramp.</li>
<li>Dislodge the top slab, and Attach it at the end of the other.</li>
<li>Stand at the end of the slab and shoot the crystal; this should propel Link upwards. Glide to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>10x Arrows - After crossing the first bridge, Attach the first slab to the moving cog. Use it as a platform to reach the chest.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1769">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277696" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1769" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277696" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Kiuyoyou Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Great Hyrule Forest</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Fire and Ice</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -1105, 2086, 0104 - In the open by some trees </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Grab the ice cube, and melt it so it fits in the alcove with the pressure plate. Place it there to open the door.</li>
<li>Glide to the other side with the air flow.</li>
<li>Ultrahand the metal plate to block the flames. Then, grab the ice cube out and Attach the metal plate on top of it. Place the cube on the spikes and let it slide back to the start.</li>
<li>Place the cube underneath the flames in the starting room to activate the pressure plate and open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282505">Zonaite Spear</a> - In the 2nd room. Ultrahand the smaller ice cube and place it on the higher ledge. Reach the ledge using the metal plate and climb to the chest.</p>
</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277797" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1773" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277797" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Kudanisar Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Desert</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Bridging the Sands</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -4168, -2140, 0050 - On top of the rock plateau </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Make your way to the ledge with the light ahead. Be mindful of your stamina, and take breaks on the flowing wooden platforms.</li>
<li>Attach 2 of these platforms to form a longer one, and use it to get past the fence.</li>
<li>Ultrahand the vertical board away, then destroy the construct hiding behind.</li>
<li>Repeat step 2 to get to the ladder, then press the pressure plate. This should launch a small ball to the other side of the room.</li>
<li>Paraglide to the lower ledge, and pilot a boat to the other side of the room. Ascend through the ledge and destroy the construct.</li>
<li>Attach the ball to one of the boats, then press the pressure plate to lower the gate. Pilot the boat back to first boat platform.</li>
<li>Attach boards end-to-end to create a ramp to the stairs. Drop the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Hasty Elixir - On top of a pillar, guarded by a construct. When piloting the sand boat, turn right to notice the pillar.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277065" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Kyononis Shrine</td>

<p><strong>Location:</strong> -0205, 0451, 0021 - ??  </p>

<ol>

<li>Attach the now-available structure at the top of the first contraption. Then, jump in the bowl and activate it to launch Link to the end statue.</li>
</ol>

                                                                                                                                    <td>Eldin Canyon</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Wheeled Wonders</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 1761, 2508, 0473 - Above Goron City  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Attach the end of the bridge to the poles to cross the gap.</li>
<li>Attach the wheeled platform to the end of the bridge, then activate the wheels. The platform should roll past the gap and extend the bridge.</li>
<li>Attach both wheeled platforms together, then jump on them and activate the wheels to cross the large gap.</li>
<li>Ascend to the higher platform and defeat the construct.</li>
<li>Attach the grate to the front of the vehicule and activate it. This should push most balls on the pressure plate and open the end statue.</li>
</ol>

<ul>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>Location:</strong> -0705, -0865, 0031 - Windvane Meadow, near the Exchange Ruins.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ul>

<li>Once attached - go to top level and swing at level to make the pole swing like a bat. </li>
<li>Wait for the ball to hit 3rd to 4th notch on ground for correct timing. </li>

                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277955" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayahisik Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>East Necluda</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rauru's Blessing</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 3730, -2058, 0189 - <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278227">Retsam Forest Cave</a> - In a small alcove, right of both entrances.</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Walk up to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279686">Magic Scepter</a> - Just before the end statue.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1781">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278334" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1781" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278334" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayak Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Eldin Mountains</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Timely Catches</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 1269, 3733, 0105 - In the open, near the edge of the cliff </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Jump on the pillar to the left to launch Link to the next ledge.</li>
<li>Place the ball on the slide. While it is sliding, jump back on the first platform.</li>
<li>Just when the ball falls off the slide, hit the crystal, This should move the target right underneath the ball and open the door to the next room.</li>
<li>Repeat steps 1 to 3, timing the crystal for when the ball comes into view.</li>
<li>Walk up to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonai Charge - In the 2nd room, dangling from a rope. While falling down, shoot the rope to drop the chest in a pool of water below.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1783">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277775" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277775" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayam Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rauru's Blessing</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 0340, 2814, 1821 - On top of the cross-shaped island. </p>
<p><strong>Shrine Quest:</strong> <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277776">The North Hyrule Sky Crystal</a></p>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>

                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1770">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277798" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1770" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277798" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayamats Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Highlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Route for a Ball</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -4639, -1510, 0452 - On the edge of the cliff </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Glide to the higher ledge with the air flow.</li>
<li>Ascend to the ledge on the left and Ultrahand the ball down.</li>
<li>Place the ball in the V-shaped groove in the right wall, then Ascend through it.</li>
<li>Recall the smaller ball when it's just above the rail, then immediately cancel it; it should drop on the rail and into the basket.</li>
<li>Attach both balls together and place them on the rail in the first room. They should slide down, but not fall into the hole.</li>
<li>Dislodge the smaller ball into the socket to open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonai Charge - After first grabbing the ball, place it in the pit in front of the wind current. Use the ball as a platform to the ledge with the chest.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1783">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278360" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278360" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayanas Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>The Ice Guides You</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 4611, -0945, 1789 - On top of Valor Island.</p>
<p><strong>Shrine Quest:</strong> <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284234">The South Lanayru Sky Crystal</a></p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Use the Frost Emitter to create blocks of ice out of the pond in the center.</li>
<li>Drop an ice block on the spiked ramp, timing the release to the ice block hits the moving target.</li>
<li>Walk through the gate to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284236">Mighty Zonaite Shield</a> - Beyond the end statue, beyond a gate. Same solution as the first puzzle, but this time, place the metal slabs on the right side so the blocks get bounced to the left on the target.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1767">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278032" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1767" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">

                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rauru's Blessing</em></p>

<p><strong>Solution:</strong> None; reach the shrine to complete it.</p>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Diamond - Just before the end statue.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1783">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278350" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278350" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayasiar Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Rauru's Blessing</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3485, 0320, 1932 - Inside the Skyview Island. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> <em>Note: This is the solution to make the shrine appear</em></p>
<ol>
<li>Pivot the central gear until the light reflects off a mirror, on the side of the island.</li>
<li>Follow the beam of light until it stops, pivoting mirrors as needed so the light beam always hits another mirror.</li>
<li>Continue the chain until it hits the glowing hexagon in the center of the island.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283452">Star-Fragment Staff</a> - Just before the end statue.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1773">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="276956" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1773" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276956" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayatat Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Desert</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Sliding Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3290, -2512, 0024 - Near the Kara Kara Bazaar </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Recall one of the sliding sleds, then jump on it to reach the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Attach a Steering Stick and a Fan to the Sled, then pilot it to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Arrow x10 - In the large room, on a higher platform to the left. Pilot the boat there first, then glide to the lower platform and build another one to reach the end.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1783">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277058" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277058" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mayaumekis Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Downward Force</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -2947, 3051, 0897 - Rising Island Chain of the Hebra Sky </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Shoot the crystal through the bars to open the door.</li>
<li>Defeat the construct atop the ledge, then jump and bounce off the trampoline to the ledge above.</li>
<li>Wait for the moving trampoline to move closer, then jump on the trampoline just beneath and glide to it.</li>
<li>Wait for it to move closer, then bounce on the next platform.</li>
<li>Bounce on the nearby trampoline, and at the peak of the jump, shoot the crystal through the bars.</li>
<li>Head to the trampoline ahead, and bounce to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Arrow x10 - In the corner of the main room, on a high pillar. While on the moving trampoline, bounce once you reach the corner.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1795">

                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277697" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1795" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277697" class="location-link"></a></td>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Lanayru Great Spring</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>The Power of Water</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 3302, 0423, 0112 - Under the walkways of <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276828">Zora's Domain</a> </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Grab the empty Battery and place it at the end of the circuit, on the right.</li>
<li>Attach the stone plate on the wheel, opposite of the other. Then, move it slightly to get it moving and recharge the Battery.</li>
<li>Jump in the moving platform, then place the Battery in the socket to power it upwards to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Opal - After recharging the battery, bring it close to the left-side pool. Cross the water, then Ultrahand the battery on the plate to complete the circuit and open the door to the chest.</li>
<li>Magic Scepter - Use Ultrahand to lift the chest out of the water next to the waterfall.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1783">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278365" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278365" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Mogisari Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Courage to Jump</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 4656, 3456, 1010 - In front of the Lomey Sky Labyrinth </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Glide to the lower ledge, then pilot the left vehicle over the right ramp.</li>
<li>Staying on the vehicle, pilot over the lava, the spikes and the beams.</li>
<li>After the beams, turn right until you see the Rockets. Destroy the construct there.</li>
<li>Attach two Rockets to your vehicle and use them to cross the giant gap.</li>
<li>Ride in style to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283445">Mighty Zonaite Shield</a> - After the beams, turn left instead and ram into the dark blocks, breaking them. The chest is behind them.</li>

<p>Flaxel's Squad:</p>
<ul>

                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>West Necluda</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Bouncy Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 1178, -0781, 0133 - On a floating island, connected to the ground by a thick root. Climb up the root, or glide from the higher sky islands. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Step on the launch pad to launch Link upwards and glide to the ledge.</li>
<li>Step on the Spring, then activate it to launch Link upwards and glide to the ledge.</li>
<li>Bring the Spring against the right-most fence, and use it to reach the platform.</li>
<li>On that platform, take the Spring and prop it against the slanted slab to create a makeshift launch pad. Use it to send the ball on the main platform and into the socket.</li>
<li>Glide back to the main platform, then Attach the Spring to the other 2 in the next room. Place the triple spring against the far wall.</li>
<li>Climb the triple spring, then activate it to reach the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Sneaky Elixir - After activating the triple Spring, glide to the platform halfway up the steep wall.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278378" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1769" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278378" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Musanokir Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Great Hyrule Forest</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Swing to Hit</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 0417, 2127, 0143 - Just south of the Great Deku Tree</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Attach the metal ball to the side of the cube and walk across the raised slab.</li>
<li>Attach the metal cube to the hanging ball. Then, raise it away from the target and let it swing.</li>
<li>Attach the cylinder at the front of the slab, and the metal cube to the ball underneath. Then, swing the cube backwards to propel the slab forward and hit the target.</li>
<li>Walk to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonai Charge - On a raised platform, in the final room. Use the cylinder as a bridge to get on the slab, then glide to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

</ol>

<ol>
<li>Head left of the staircase, and destroy the construct.</li>
<li>Ascend to the higher platform, then turn right and fall down. Destroy the 2nd construct.</li>
<li>Open the door atop the staircase with Ultrahand.</li>
<li>Walk into the lasers to fall down. Walk to the end, then Ascend to the chest with the Small Key and Ascend again.</li>
<li>Defeat both constructs and open the door to grab the ball.</li>
<li>Ride the elevator up and drop the ball in the socket to open the hangar.</li>
<li>Attach the ball to the glider and ride it back to the starting room.</li>
<li>Drop the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>5x Arrows - After the 2nd construct, instead of climbing the staircase, continue forward. The chest is in an alcove, guarded by a construct.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1795">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277700" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1795" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277700" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Oromuwak Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Tabantha Frontier</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Launching Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3079, 1617, 0243 - On top of the mountain ridge, surrounded by spikes. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Place a Rocket in the groove, then activate it. It should launch itself into the target and open the door.</li>
<li>Attach a Rocket to the minecart. Then, jump in it and activate it to reach the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Repeat step 2, placing the minecart on the slope. This should propel the cart to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Ruby - In the 3rd room, on a high platform. Attach a Rocket to a minecart, pointing upwards, and activate it.</li>
</ul></td>

                                </td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277801" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277801" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Rakashog Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Reflective Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -1713, -2120, -1149 - On a small, lonely island.</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the mirror by the door, and place it in the beam of light so it hits the hexagon. This should open the door.</li>
<li>In the next room, Ultrahand the mirror through the window in the bars. Hold it high in the beam of light, facing right, so it hits the hexagon and opens the door.</li>
<li>Before traversing, send the light beam through the door. On the other side, angle the mirror down so it hits the hexagon and activates the elevator.</li>
<li>Defeat both constructs. Then, use a mirror to reflect the light beam on either side of the stone slab. Use the other to reflect it on the hexagon, opening the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonai Charge - After activating the elevator, place the mirror down so the light beam gets reflected upwards. Use the mirror on the upper platform to activate the hexagon and reach the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278344" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Rasiwak Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Deep Akkala</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Flotational Brilliance</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 4663, 3263, 0001 - On the beach, in plain sight.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Shoot an arrow through the rope to drop the platform into the water.</li>
<li>Using Ultrahand, attach the floating ball to the platform to raise it, allowing Link to cross the water.</li>
<li>Dislodge the floating ball and move it under the stone slab; this should rise it, making a ramp to access the following ledge.</li>
<li>Build a makeshift raft by Attaching both a floating ball and a fan to the stone slab. Step on it, and activate the fan to move the boat to the end platform.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281647">Magic Scepter</a> - In the final room, at the bottom of the pool. Attach a floating ball to it to get it out of the water.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Rattled Ralera</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Side Quest</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>East Necluda</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How to Begin:</strong> Talk to Ralera after completing <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282395">Lurelin Village Restoration Project</a>  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong>   </p>
<ol>
<li>Make her a Mighty Seafood Curry, using the following ingredients:
<ul>
<li>A Mighty Porgy, available for purchase on the docks of Lurelin Village;</li>
<li>Goron Spice, available at Goron's City <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276855">General Store</a>;</li>
<li>Hylian Rice, obtainable by cutting grass all across Hyrule.</li>
</ul></li>
<li>Summon a gust of wind, either by using a Fan or using a board-fused weapon.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Reward:</strong> <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284654">Lurelin Village Fabric</a></p></td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Ren-iz Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Jump the Gaps</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 0756, 0823, 0082 - In the remains of a massive carved-out tree  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the metal plate, and prop it against the top of the raised wall. It should be slanted slightly upwards.</li>
<li>Activate the pillar to drop a ball; it should roll down and hit your makeshift ramp to the hole. Adjust as necessary.</li>
<li>In the next room, Attach both metal plates together to form a giant L shape. Drop the L in front of the hole to form another ramp.</li>
<li>Activate the pillar to drop the ball and open the gate to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280424">Strong Zonaite Shield [Chest]</a> - In the 2nd room, before forming the L shape, Attach both plates into a long bridge. Use it to reach the chest just right of the entrance.</li>
</ul></td>
