                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277811" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277811" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Riogok Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Force Transfer</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -1440, -1616, 0089 -   </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the pipe and attach it to the two cogs. Hit the crystal to open the gate.</li>
<li>After entering the next room, turn around and Rewing the cog. While Rewind is active, dislodge the pipe and bring it with you.</li>
<li>Ultrahand the pipe to the small lever, and move it to the left to open the gate.</li>
<li>Bring all 3 pipes to the higher platform, then Ascend to it.</li>
<li>One by one, Attach the pipes underneath the higher platform.</li>
<li>Once all 3 pipes are attached, Ascend to the higher platform to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280396">Mighty Construct Bow [Chest]</a> - In the 2nd room, on a high ledge. Using Ultrahand, attach 2 pipes together, then attach the chest to this long pipe and bring it to the ground.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8977 region-1783">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278234" data-category-id="8977" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1783" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278234" class="location-link"></a></td>

                                                                                                    <td class="info"></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Rotsumamu Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Highlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Balanced Plan</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3405, -1365, 0335 - Beside the chasm, under a ledge. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Run up the seesaw to the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Attach the metal barrel to the raised end of the seesaw, then use it to climb to the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Extend the raised end of the seesaw with the slab, and attach the metal cube to it. Then, grab a cube from the lowered end and place it on the other end. This should swap the seesaw and allow access to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Large Zonaite - Past the 3rd seesaw; place the slab to create a bridge and jump to the ledge with the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277059" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1771" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277059" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Runakit Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Ridge</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Built to Carry</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -2527, 1169, 0177 - In the open, west of the tower. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Climb the ladder on the farthest ledge, then place the ball on the rails to slide it to the lower ledge.</li>
<li>Attach both poles together, then the ball under it in the center. Place the contraption on the rails, which should slide to the lower ledge.</li>
<li>Build the following contraption. Then, place it on the single rail to slide it to the starting platform.
<ul>
<li>Attach two square stone slabs in an L-shape.</li>
<li>Under each slab, attach a pole so it looks like a roof with 2 columns.</li>
<li>Attach the ball to both pillars.</li>
</ul></li>
<li>Place the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282768">Construct Bow</a> - On a pillar, beyond the 2nd lower ledge. Attach multiple stone slabs end-to-end to make a ramp to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3354, 2387, 0361 - Near the top of Corvash Peak. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Cross the laser-filled hallway. Jump over the low lasers and crouch under the others.</li>
<li>Ascend to the higher platform and turn left.</li>
<li>Cross the two hallways, jumping over the 1st laser and crouching under the 2nd.</li>
<li>In the final hallway, wait for the structure to be near, then Ascend through the top and glide to the end platform.</li>
</ol>

<ul>
<li>Spicy Elixir - On the higher platform, crouch under the laser. Then, Ultrahand the block in front of the laser to open the gate to the chest.</li>

                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278231" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Sepapa Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Backtrack</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 0222, 1086, 0028 - Behind a small hill, just east of Hyrule Castle.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Rewind the moving platform to lift you up the ledge.</li>
<li>Light both candles flanking the door to open it.
<ul>
<li>If you can't make fire, take the torch beside the door, and ride the wooden raft. On the other side, Rewind it, and light the torch on the your way back.</li>
</ul></li>
<li>Using Ultrahand, place the ball in the closest hole. Wait a few seconds, then place it in the second hole.</li>
<li>Cross the first gate, then Rewind the ball. Doing so should close the first gate and open the second to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280438">Strong Construct Bow [Chest]</a> - Up a wooden platform, in the 2nd room. While crossing the water on the raft, light your torch and burn away the vines to drop the chest.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-9021 region-1779">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Serenade to a Great Fairy</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Side Adventure</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Eldin Canyon</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How To Begin:</strong> Begin <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846">Potential Princess Sightings</a>, then meet up with Penn at <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279491">Woodland Stable</a></p>
<p>A musical troupe called <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279499">The Stable Trotters</a> claim they've seen a blonde girl shut herself inside a flower bud. Penn suspects this might be Princess Zelda. Perhaps the flower bud will open if the blonde woman hears music?</p>
<p>You need to bring The Stable Trotters to the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279490">Great Fairy</a> flower bud. But, to do that, you must first repair their cart and find a horse to pull it.</p>
<p><strong>Reward:</strong> Rupees, amount depends on your "base pay" for the Lucky Clover Gazette</p>
<p><strong>Next Side Adventure:</strong></p>
<ul>

<p>The Stable Trotters are eager to play their music for Great Fairy Cotera, but they can't cross the bridge! Use Ultrahand to solve this transportation crisis.</p>
<p>After successfully crossing the river, guide the cart to Great Fairy Cotera.</p>

                                                                                                    <td>Side Adventure</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How To Begin:</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>Complete <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983">Serenade to a Great Fairy</a> &amp; <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280107">The Flute Player's Plan</a></li>

</ol>
<p>The Stable Trotters are larger to play their music for Great Fairy Kaysa, but their trusty wagon is in disrepair, and there doesn't seem to be the usual wagon wheels nearby.</p>
<p>Leaning against a boulder, there's a stone and Zonai tech cart you can repair. Use Ultrahand to put the missing wheel back, and attach the Zonai controller on top. Then, Place the Stable Trotter's wagon on top of the stone slab.</p>
<p><strong>Reward:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>100 Rupees</li>

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278232" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Serutabomac Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>The Way Up</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -0179, 1170, 0280 - Hyrule Castle B1  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Place the metal plate on the two supporting beams, then Ascend through it to reach the ledge.</li>
<li>Attach the metal plates in an L shape, then prop the structure against the support beam. Ascend through the structure to the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Place a square plate on the ground. On either side, Attach another plate vertically, then rotate it so the longer plate is on the ground. </li>
<li>Place the structure on the supporting beams. You should be able to Ascend twice to the final ledge.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280442">Magic Rod [Chest]</a> - In the 3rd room. Attach the metal plates so it forms a bridge-like structure. Then, rotate it on its side and prop it against the wall, on the spiked floor. Jump on the plate and Ascend to the ledge with the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Alignment</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 2401, 3280, 0402 - Amidst the rocky cliffs. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Recall the 2nd second rotating cylinder. When the pillar is aligned with the bottom one, stop the Recall.</li>
<li>Repeat step 1 for each cylinder, aligning them into a single tall pillar.</li>
<li>Ascend through the pillar to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283435">Strong Zonaite Longsword</a> - After aligning the first 2 pillars, Ascend through and glide to the chest, in an alcove in the pillar.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277061" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277061" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Sinakawak Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>An Uplifting Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -1372, 0749, 0086 - Just behind <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276878">New Serenne Stable</a>.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Create a makeshift Hot-air Platform; you can do so by attaching a Candle to the center of a Board, then attacking a Balloon on top of the candle.</li>
<li>Use the hot-air platform to reach the higher ledge; if the platform flies away, you can Rewind it to the ground.</li>
<li>Dislodge the Board from the hot-air platform, and place the Candle-Balloon in front of the gate. It should rise and open the gate.</li>
<li>Paraglide to the bottom floor, and make another Hot-air Platform, this time attaching the small ball to it.</li>
<li>Ascend to the higher ledge, then Dislodge the ball into the small socket, opening the gate to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Opal - In the final room, make the following contraption. Attach the Large Ball to the Board, then 2 Candles on opposite corners. Finally, attach a Balloon to each candle; the contraption should slowly ascend. Dislodge it from the higher ledge and into the large socket.</li>
</ul></td>

<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>

<li>Attach both balls together, and place them horizontally on the angled slope. They should remain stable enough for you to cross and access the end statue.</li>
</ol>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Sonapan Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Ridge</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Missing Pathways</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -1921, -0361, 0228 - On the side of Satori Mountain, in an apple grove. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ascend through the ledge.</li>
<li>Place the metal cube on top of the ledge, then Ascend through it to the staircase.</li>
<li>Ultrahand the metal cube form the alcove to the pool, just underneath the ledge.</li>
<li>Ascend through the alcove on the ledge. Then, paraglide to the metal cube and Ascend to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Arrow x5 - Embedded high in a wall. After ascending the first ledge, bring the metal cube from the right alcove to the left, creating a pathway to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1773">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="276958" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1773" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276958" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Soryotanog Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Desert</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Buried Light</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3884, -2964, 0123 - At the top of the palace in Gerudo Town </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Dislodge the Fan from the sand dune. Activate it, then Ultrahand it to blow away the last sand dune.</li>
<li>Pick up the Small Key from the chest and open the door.</li>
<li>In the next room, Ascend to the ledge on the left and destroy the construct.</li>
<li>Blow away the sand dunes to reveal both a beam of light and a mirror. Place the mirror on the upper ledge to reflect the beam through the gates. Aim at the corner of the walls beyond the bars.</li>
<li>Return in the first room, and blow away the mirror from the sand dune. Using Ultrahand, reflect the light beam into the hexagon above the door.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>10x Arrows - Beyond the Small Key door, turn right and crouch in the alcove. There, blow away the sand dunes and grab the Fan Guster from the defeated construct. Glide to the upper ledge using your Fan, then attack the sand dune with the Fan Guster to blow it away. The cog should move and open the door to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277066" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277066" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Susuyai Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>A Spinning Device</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -0785, -0434, 0018 - ??  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the moving carts away to safely cross to the other side. Make sure to bring a cart to the far side.</li>
<li>Position the cart forward, then activate it to cross the moving platform.</li>
<li>Using Ultrahand, dislodge a Wheel from the cart and attack it to the side of the crank. Activate the Wheel to rotate the crank and open the gate.</li>
<li>Remove the platform from the rail, and attach a Wheel in the opening above.</li>
<li>Replace the platform on the rail, and activate the Wheel to move the platform to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="278026" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278026" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Tadarok Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Fire and Water</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> Inside <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278223">River of the Dead Waterfall Cave</a> </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Using Ultrahand, attach the block to the balls in the water and place them on the opposite side. Swim across to the next room.</li>
<li>Block the fire melting the ice block by using the stone block.</li>
<li>Drop the ice block into the lava to create a bridge.</li>
<li>Pull the wood block out of the fire and drop it in the water to put it out. Take it back to the main room.</li>
<li>Grab another ice block and drop it in the water under the ledge with the fire. Be sure to pull out the electricity ball from the water.</li>
<li>Attach the stone block from the first room, the block from the main room and the wood block to create a pillar. Make sure the wood block is NOT on the bottom.</li>
<li>Place your block pillar on the ledge above the ice block. Jump onto the ice block and use Ascend to get up.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Mighty Zonaite Shield</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1772">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277063" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277063" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Tajikats Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Building With Logs</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> Along the river, in plain sight.</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Use Ultrahand to maneuver the log into a ramp to get up the first hurdle. Make sure to prop up the log on a corner so it doesn't roll away!</li>
<li>In the next area, you will be give 2 more logs. Grab the log from the previous step, and create a tripod-looking shape with all three. The angle-fused legs should be able to lean on the ledge of the ramp, allowing you to cross without it slipping away.</li>
<li>Fuse the 2 new logs into a bridge to cross the small water obstacle.</li>
<li>You are given 4 additional logs. Using all 4, plus the 2 from the previous water obstacle, you need to create a bridge that is 3-logs long and 2-logs thick; the double wide bridge will prevent rolling.</li>
<li>In the final area, you are given 9 logs and 2 propellers. You can either use the propellers to create a boat, or use the all the logs (plus the logs from the previous step) to create a massive bridge to the shrine's end. Or, if you have enough stamina, you can swim across.)</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Spiky Shield: In the final area, there is a small platform on the left side of the water.</li>
</ul></td>

<p><strong>Puzzle Name:</strong> Combat Training: Archery</p>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277064" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1767" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277064" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Tauyosipun Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hebra Mountains</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Forward or Backward?</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -4535, 2878, 0262 - On the western side of the mountain.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Recall one of the large balls, and run behind it as it rolls up the ramp.</li>
<li>Step on the pressure plate to block the ramp, and wait for a ball to fall into it.</li>
<li>Ultrahand the large ball and place it on the ramp.</li>
<li>Recall the first ball. pushing the 2nd one into the socket and opening the door.</li>
<li>Wait for the ball to fall on the 2nd platform, then Recall it.</li>
<li>When the ball is in mid-air, just between the two platforms, stop the Recall. It should fall into the socket and open the gate to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282415">Strong Construct Bow</a> - Beyond the first ramp, Recall the wheel just as the chest falls onto it. It should rotate towards Link.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                                                    <td>Sky</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Gravity and Velocity</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -0972, 2525, 1011 - On the entrance platform of the North Lomei Castle Top Floor.</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Wait for the ball to be in the right launcher, then hit the switch. This should reverse the gravity and guide the ball to the target.</li>
<li>Using the left launcher, launch Link to the next room. Wait for the ball to respawn and be launched through the doorway into the basket.</li>
<li>Let the ball be launched in the air, then hit the crystal as the ball flies over the target. This should open the way to the end statue.</li>
</ol>

<ul>
<li>Large Zonai Charge - In an alcove, underneath the target. Paraglide from the 2nd room to the chest.</li>

                                                                                                    <td>Side Quest</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Desert</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How to Begin:</strong> Speak to Rotana in the Gerudo shelter. She wants you to take pictures of some writing for her. All are located in the stronghold.</p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Take off your clothes and you will be put in jail. Take a picture of the writing on the back wall.</li>
<li>In the training room. Break the boulders.  -3891, -2996, 0032</li>
<li>Past the classroom and into where they keep the sand seals. Ultrahand piece that is separated and insert into plaque. -3848, -2944, 0029</li>
<li>In the classroom. In two pieces. Stand on stool or back to grid coordinates to take a picture. -3858, 2982, 0032</li>
</ol>

                                                                                                    <td>Side Adventure</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Tabantha Frontier</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How To Begin:</strong> Speak to Eustus, the hornist for The Stable Trotters</p>
<p>Eustus's wagon broke, leaving him stranded! Repair the wagon with Ultrahand and free the hornist from his purgatory.</p>
<p>Tip: You do not need to <em>safely</em> land the wagon. The minute the wagon leaves the hole's perimeter, it will cut to Eustus and Link talking nearby.</p>

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280473" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">The Horse Guard's Request</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Side Quest</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How to Begin:</strong> Talk to Toffa looking at the horses in the stable.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>First, bring a Stalhorse to Toffa so he can see.  The closest <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284493">Stalhorse</a> can be found there.</li>
<li>Next, he wants to see a tamed animal that isn't a horse. The closest would be a honeyvore bear in Dalite Forest, to the northwest.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Reward:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>2x Pony Points</li>
<li>A Purple Rupee and a Silver Rupee</li>
</ul></td>

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277852" class="location-link"></a></td>

<li>In main hall. -3887, -2971, 0033</li>

<li>East of the main gate. -3782, -2900, 0047</li>
<li>On top of a destroyed building. You have to blow sand away. -3802, -2966, 0057</li>
<li>Located at the Kara Kara bazaar. You have to complete the quest where you have to find the missing 3rd guy. After that you can take the ball. -3273, -2582, 0023</li>

<li>Defeat the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277777">Flux Construct I</a> on the sky island to the south and retrieve the crystal</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                    <td>Side Quest</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hebra Mountains</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><strong>How to Begin:</strong> Interact with the terminal at the center of the labyrinth.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Reach the North Lomei Castle Top Floor, by the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278354">Tenbez Shrine</a>.</li>
<li>Activate each of the four terminals within the Top Floor:
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282918">North Terminal</a></li>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282919">South Terminal</a></li>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282922">East Terminal</a></li>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282917">Central Terminal</a></li>
</ul></li>
<li>A new terminal will spawn atop the labyrinth; interact with it to open the gate to the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281124">North Lomei Chasm</a>; dive into it.</li>
<li>Defeat the <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284497">Flux Construct III</a> to complete the quest.  </li>
</ul>

                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277831" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1779" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Timawak Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Eldin Canyon</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Against the Flow</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 1799, 1638, 0311 - On the side of the road, facing Goronbi Lake.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Jump across the solidified lava to the other side, then destroy the construct.</li>
<li>Rewind a platform and ride it to the ball. When Rewind ends, return with the ball and place it in the socket.</li>
<li>In the next room, activate the fan and glide to the next platform. Drop a fountain down.</li>
<li>Activate the fountain to create a platform. Take it out of the lava and attach the fan to it.</li>
<li>Ride your makeshift boat to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281651">Strong Zonaite Shield</a> - In an alcove, beyond the ball. Ultrahand a freshly-made platform for a few seconds, then Rewind it and jump to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277794" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1772" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277794" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Tsutsu-um Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Field</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>The Stakes Guide You</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> ?? - On a small hill overlooking <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277792">Outskirt Stable</a>.  </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Using Ultrahand, attach the platform to the pillar when it's at the bottom.</li>
<li>Climb on the platform and paraglide to the metal platform, using the fan to extend your air time.</li>
<li>Replace the 3 stakes as follows, so the giant ball goes into the hole:
<ul>
<li>In front of the ball's launching ramp, so it hits the stake and falls straight down.</li>
<li>Under the rotating platform, so it slants slightly downwards.</li>
<li>After the ball has fallen on the railing, on the rotating circle so it pushes the ball into the hole. </li>
</ul></li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>5x Arrows - On top of a pillar. When paragliding to the fan, take a sharp turn left on the pillar.</li>
</ul></td>

                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277025" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1778" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277025" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Tukarok Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Lanayru Wetlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Forward Force</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 0915, -0250, -0034 - In a grove beside the stable. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Walk to the end of the hallway and drop down.</li>
<li>Attach the ball to the vehicule, then activate it to make it cross the lava.</li>
<li>Attach the Big Wheel to the slab on the rail, then Attach the rectangular slab to it and the ball on top. When activated, the slab should advance all the way to the top.</li>
<li>Bring the ball into the next room, and Attach it to the board with wheels. Then, Attach a board to each Wheel to create paddles.</li>
<li>Place the paddleboat between the fences and activate it, then place the ball on the pressure plate to open the door.</li>
<li>Place the ball in the socket to reach the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279459">Strong Zonaite Sword</a> - Under the water, between the two fences. Grab it with Ultrahand.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                    <td class="td-title">Turakamik Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Gerudo Highlands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Hidden Metal</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -2654, -2238, 0067 - On a high ledge on the side of the canyon road. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Attach the electrified ball to the other to close the circuit and activate the giant cog. Ride it to the higher ledge.</li>
<li>Using Ultrahand, swing one of the balls side-to-side, then Attach the other one to it. Then, Ascend to the alternating pillars.</li>
<li>Dislodge the pipe from the cog system, and place it on the beams next to the electrified ball. Attach the ball to it to open the door to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282819">Strong Zonaite Shield</a> - In the 3rd room, before removing the pole, Recall the cog and ride it to the higher ledge.</li>
</ul></td>
                                                                                            </tr><tr class="checklist-item map-536 category-8980 region-1771">
                                <td class="clickable" data-sort="y">
                                    <input class="check" type="checkbox" data-location-id="277786" data-category-id="8980" data-map-id="536" data-region-id="1771" disabled="" aria-label="Login to track progress" data-balloon-pos="right">
                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277786" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Turakawak Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Hyrule Ridge</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Stacking a Path</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -3496, -0197, 0066 - Down in Tabatha Frontier, on the shore of a lake, surrounded by thorns. </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the block against the ledge, then climb it.</li>
<li>Once on the ledge, Attach both blocks vertically, and place them under the ladder to reach it.</li>
<li>Grab the first two blocks, and Attach them to the metal block, slightly offset.</li>
<li>Using the offset, Ascend through the blocks to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282786">Magic Rod</a> - In a locked room. From the first high ledge, look up and Ascend through the fenced ceiling. Ascend again to get out.</li>
</ul></td>

                                </td>
                                <td class="clickable location-link-wrapper"><a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277940" class="location-link"></a></td>
                                                                    <td class="td-title">Utsushok Shrine</td>
                                                                                                    <td>Shrine</td>
                                                                                                                                    <td>Faron Grasslands</td>
                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Long or Wide</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> 0673, -3357, 0071 - On top of the hill </p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Ultrahand the slab up, then release it to smack the ball into the socket.</li>
<li>Attach the cube behind the slab, then repeat step 1.</li>
<li>Attach the metal slab behind the other to extend it, then repeat step 1. This should drop a minecart on the rails beside the slab.</li>
<li>Reattach the slab to the side, so it reaches the minecart.</li>
<li>Jump in the minecart, then repeat step 1 to propel the minecart to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Sneaky Elixir - On a platform, just before the end statue. Grab it with Ultrahand while travelling in the minecart. If you miss it, Recall the minecart.</li>
</ul></td>

                                                                                                    <td class="info"><p><em>Lever Power</em></p>
<p><strong>Location:</strong> -4059, 1990, 0183 - <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279660">West Lake Totori Cave</a>  - At the end of the cave.</p>
<p><strong>Shrine Quest:</strong> <a href="https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283119">The White Bird's Guidance</a></p>
<p><strong>Solution:</strong> </p>
<ol>
<li>Attach the bowl to the closest end of the rotating slab.</li>
<li>Place the ball into bowl. Then, Ultrahand the cube high above the farthest end of the slab and drop it. This should launch the ball on the lower target.
<ul>
<li>Adjust as needed. Dropping the cube from higher up or closer to the end of the slab should launch the ball further.</li>
</ul></li>
<li>Grab the Board from the now open alcove, and extend your catapult. Repeat step 2 until you hit the higher target.</li>
<li>Instead of launching the ball, launch Link in the air and paraglide to the end statue.</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>Treasure:</strong> </p>
<ul>
<li>Spicy Elixir - On a platform, high against the eastern wall. When launching Link, guickly paraglide right to the chest.</li>
</ul></td>
